title: section, hereby make the following regulations with respect to which, pursuant
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Protection of Young Persons
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Protection of Young Persons 
(Employment) (Exclusion of Workers in the Fishing and Shipping Sectors) 
Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited protection young person (employment) (exclusion worker fishing shipping sectors) regulation 2021

title: section, hereby make the following regulations with respect to which, pursuant
heading: In these Regulations, “Act of 1996” means the Protection of Young
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Act of 1996” means the Protection of Young 

Persons (Employment) Act 1996 (No. 16 of 1996).
text_norm: 2 regulation act 1996 mean protection young person (employment) act 1996 (no 16 1996)

title: section, hereby make the following regulations with respect to which, pursuant
heading: 3. An employer in the fishing or shipping sectors may employ a young
text_raw:
3. An employer in the fishing or shipping sectors may employ a young 
person in either of those sectors on terms other than those specified in section 
6(1)(a) of the Act of 1996 provided that - 

(a) 

(b) 

any young person so employed 
compensatory rest time within a reasonable period, and 

is allowed equivalent 

in the case of an employer in the fishing sector, such terms are in 
accordance with the requirements of Regulation 5(2) of the 
European Union (International Labour Organisation Work in 
Fishing Convention) (Minimum Age) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 
179 of 2020).
text_norm: 3 employer fishing shipping sector may employ young person either sector term specified section 6(1)(a) act 1996 provided - (a) (b) young person employed compensatory rest time within reasonable period allowed equivalent case employer fishing sector term accordance requirement regulation 5(2) european union (international labour organisation work fishing convention) (minimum age) regulation 2020 (s.i no 179 2020)

title: section, hereby make the following regulations with respect to which, pursuant
heading: 4. The Protection of Young Persons (Employment) (Exclusion of Workers
text_raw:
4. The Protection of Young Persons (Employment) (Exclusion of Workers 
in the Fishing and Shipping Sectors) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 357 of 2014) 
are revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [250] 3 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 18 May 2021 

DAMIEN ENGLISH, 

 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment.
